snippet.title: Scorn - Official New Release Date Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the latest teaser for Scorn for another look at the upcoming H.R. Giger-inspired horror game, including the reveal of the game's new release date, now set for October 14, 2022.

Scorn will be available on Xbox Series X|S (day one with Xbox Game Pass) and PC (via Steam, Epic Games Store and GoG).
